metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010247 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: ZmartZone IAM mod_auth_openidc 2.3.10.1 and earlier is affected by: CrossSite Scripting (XSS). The impact is: Redirecting the user to a phishingpage or interacting with the application on behalf of the user. Thecomponent is: File: src/mod_auth_openidc.c, Line: 3109. The fixed versionis: 2.3.10.2.

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-auth-openidc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
